lender.name: Tena

lender.loan_because: I'd rather loan money to a real cause then send money to scammers.

lender.name: Mary

lender.name: Erik
lender.loan_because: Everyone should have a chance (or two)

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: I believe that micro loans are extremely effective in promoting development. I like that the money goes directly to an individual.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because:
I started my first business at 13 years old and understand how difficult it can be to find money to start something.
When you have no money, people don't want to lend you any, but once you have some the offers come flooding in!
There is a great saying: -
"When the sun is shining, the bank offers you an umbrella... When it starts to rain, they ask for it back"
I would like to be able to help people in my own small way, in the hope that it will enable them to realise their ideas and see their dreams come to fruition.
lender.occupational_info: I am involved with a variety of business ranging from telecommunications, technology and Internet through to food importing and community projects to help people with severe food problems.

lender.loan_because: I think this is the way to make the world a better place

lender.name: Marilynn

lender.name: Maureen
lender.loan_because:
I loan because this is a dignified way to make the world a better place.
I hate the poverty I see in my travels through Mexico and Guatemala and in the news I read about the economically depressed parts of our world.
Every one should have a chance to work for a better life.
I favor loans for education, housing, health, manufacturing, and agriculture.
I plan to be in Kiva for the long haul. This project is genius.
lender.occupational_info:
I worked at designing and programming computer software for business applications.
I was very lucky to get into this career in the beginning of the computer revolution.
Now I hope through Kiva to offer some good luck to someone else.
I especially like that Kiva is without political or religious agenda.

lender.name: Carena
lender.loan_because: At the bank where I am employed I see a lot of deserving people get rejected for loans simply because they aren't wealthy. It is nice to be able to help people through Kiva that I can't help through my work.

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: one day it will be me asking for money.
lender.occupational_info: Making a world where taking a risk is never the wrong choice.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: Giving is a wonderful thing, but to give to help someone be self-sufficient is glorious. To give to someone to be self-sufficient AND have that gift returned, thus perpetually continuing the cyclical cycle is amazing. I'm very happy to be involved.

lender.name: Theresa
